statement.p: Find the sine of the labeled angle in each triangle below.

li.p: The side opposite angle \phi is 5, and the hypotenuse is 13, so the sine of \phi is \text{sin } \phi =\dfrac{5}{13}, \text{ or approximately}~~ 0.3846
The side opposite angle \beta is \sqrt{5}, and the hypotenuse is 3, so the sine of \beta is \text{sin } \beta =\dfrac{\sqrt{5}}{3}, \text{ or approximately}~~ 0.7454
